DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate analgesic efficacy ADL5747 participant postherpetic neuralgia ( PHN ) . The secondary objective study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ADL5747 .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Efficacy , Safety , Tolerability ADL5747 Participants With Postherpetic Neuralgia
